Articles.Content:
So, the goal of this game is to decode the SSTV image in the post above you and post the decoded image, guess what it is, and post your own SSTV transmission. Yes, I know there was a thread like this a while back, I checked and it appears to be dead.

Here goes: https://soundcloud.com/gregory-maddra/ksp-sstv-transmission-1-fixed (Robot 36 encoding)

Edited March 27, 2014 by bloxgate
Messed up link

Evening ladies and gentlemen!

This thread had to be closed because of the Forum Games' Guidelines, specficially the area that specifies "Binary, leet speak, encrypted messages, or games where you speak in other languages." are prohibited game types.

Closing this thread
